meanings.sent1: My sister and I play together.
meanings.sent2: I have one sister and two brothers.
meanings.sent3: My sister always steals my snacks!
meanings.sent4: The bond between sisters is unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: My sister is my best friend.

meanings.definition: A woman or girl who has the same parents as another person.
meanings.sent1: Her sister looks just like her.
meanings.sent2: I am going to visit my sister this weekend.
meanings.sent3: My sister is the boss of the house!
meanings.sent4: She is like a sister to me, always there for support.
meanings.sent5: Having a sister means never being alone.

meanings.definition: A woman who shares a common interest or purpose with another person.
meanings.sent1: She is like a sister to me in our love for books.
meanings.sent2: My sister in volunteering is always ready to help.
meanings.sent3: My sister in gardening has the greenest thumb!
meanings.sent4: We are sisters in our fight for equality.
meanings.sent5: Having a sister in art makes creating even more fun.
